context.content: "Me Before You" is a romantic drama film that tells the story of a young woman who becomes a caregiver for a wealthy young banker who became paralyzed in an accident. It has a good balance of lighthearted moments and emotional romance, making it a heartwarming and touching movie.
That sounds like a good mix of lighthearted comedy and emotional romance. I think "Me Before You" fits what I'm looking for. I'll go ahead and watch it. Thanks for the recommendation! [END]
